title: Valkyrie RPG

controls: WASD keys or the Arrow keys to move.Space to jump.Left Mouse to attack.Right Mouse to block.1-8 number keys to use skill.C key to view status Window.I key to open inventory.K key to view the skill tree.Q key to open quest log.Hold Shift to sprint.Double tap to WASD for a dodge roll.ESC to go to the main menu.R key to switch weapons.H key to getting help.
content.howToPlay: When you first enter the game, proceed by pressing the "New Game" button at the top of the main menu.Then, you need to choose your character. Press the Empty Slot text, and you will see two different characters. They both have various merits.You can also choose your character's name yourself. Once you decide to play with one of them, you can find yourself in the countryside.

fullContent: Homeâ€º AdventureValkyrie RPGBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenValkyrie RPG is a role-playing adventure game where you, as a valkyria, open up to different adventures in rural areas by taking tasks from the people of that region and fulfilling these tasks. Here, you will meet people doing a wide variety of jobs. Some of them are merchants, and some are event makers and crafters. Strengthen your communication with them and open the doors of a fantastic world in one of the most thrilling action adventure games!How to Play Valkyrie RPG?When you first enter the game, proceed by pressing the "New Game" button at the top of the main menu.Then, you need to choose your character. Press the Empty Slot text, and you will see two different characters. They both have various merits.You can also choose your character's name yourself. Once you decide to play with one of them, you can find yourself in the countryside.Characters in Valkyrie RPGYou will find two valkyries in the game. Their names are Knight and Ranger. We would like to tell you about their merits below.Knight: Knight has balance status and is a loyal fighter. She may strike foes and raise her status by using both magic and physical abilities.Ranger: Ranger depends on the force of nature. She has the ability to call the animals to battle with her. However, she is not resistant to fire.Get Quests from the VillagersWhen you enter the game, you will see villagers doing different professions. Direct yourself to the person you want to take charge of and communicate with her. They will give you exciting quests and rewards afterward.For example, when you go to Event Maker, the task she will give you is to kill 2 Angry Slimes. Once you complete the quest, she will provide you with +100 Cash and +100 EXP.Check Health BarIn some missions, they will ask you to kill giant creatures, like Hobgoblin. Such creatures cause a lot of damage and are difficult to kill. Don't forget to check your health bar in the upper left corner of the screen while fighting them! When you get too low on health, you need to run away. We all do escape when we are stuck. So, do not be ashamed! ðŸ˜€ControlsWASD keys or the Arrow keys to move.Space to jump.Left Mouse to attack.Right Mouse to block.1-8 number keys to use skill.C key to view status Window.I key to open inventory.K key to view the skill tree.Q key to open quest log.Hold Shift to sprint.Double tap to WASD for a dodge roll.ESC to go to the main menu.R key to switch weapons.H key to getting help.What is More?Try Jack's Village, a 3D combat game where you, as a Jack, need to defend your town against giant creatures with the help of villagers. Or, you may look up online adventure games on OnlineGames.io for more game options. You will always find new games if you visit our site regularly!This article was updated on December 8, 20233DActionAdventureArcheryBattleFantasyFreeRPGUnity
